subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mike Modano’s power-play goal with 3 minutes 12 seconds remaining in the third period Monday night gave the Dallas Stars a 2-1 victory over the visiting Phoenix Coyotes.
snippet: Mike Modano’s power-play goal with 3 minutes 12 seconds remaining in the third period Monday night gave the Dallas Stars a 2-1 victory over the visiting Phoenix Coyotes.
